title: When will the 2010 census data for Duplin County be available?  The US Census website is not user friendly.
text:
Data has been released for all counties in N.C.



Here's a link to the StarNewsOnline.com census topic page:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/section/topic30



Here's a link to the census quick facts page about Duplin County:
http://quickfacts.census.gov/qfd/states/37/37061.html
